00010 #if !defined(__HEMesh_h__)
00011 #define __HEMesh_h__
00012 
00013 #include <vector>
00014 #include "voom.h"
00015 
00016 namespace voom {
00017 
00018   struct HalfEdge;
00019   struct Vertex;
00020   struct Face;
00021 
00023   struct HalfEdge {
00025     HalfEdge() {
00026       opposite = next = prev = 0;
00027       face = 0; 
00028       vertex = 0;
00029       id = -1;
00030     }
00031 
00033     HalfEdge * opposite;
00035     HalfEdge * next;
00037     HalfEdge * prev;
00039     Face * face;
00041     Vertex * vertex;
00042 
00044     int id;
00045   };
00046   
00047   struct Face {
00049     Face() { halfEdges[0] = halfEdges[1] = halfEdges[2] = 0; id=-1; }
00050 
00052     HalfEdge * halfEdges[3];
00053 
00055     int id;
00056   };
00057 
00058   struct Vertex {
00060     Vertex() { id = -1; boundary = false; }
00061 
00063     int id;
00064 
00066     bool boundary;
00067 
00069     std::vector< HalfEdge* > halfEdges;
00070   };
00071 
00072 
00074 
00077   struct HalfEdgeMesh {
00078 
00079     std::vector< HalfEdge* > halfEdges;
00080     std::vector< Face* > faces;
00081     std::vector< Vertex* > vertices;
00082 
00084     //typedef tvmet::Vector<int,3> TriangleConnectivity;
00085     typedef Eigen::Vector3i TriangleConnectivity;
00086 
00088     typedef std::vector<TriangleConnectivity> ConnectivityContainer;
00089 
00090     // construct HalfEdge data structure from a connectivity array
00091     HalfEdgeMesh(const ConnectivityContainer & connectivities, int nVertices);
00092 
00093     // Delete structs
00094     virtual ~HalfEdgeMesh() {
00095       for(int f=0; f<faces.size(); f++) delete faces[f];
00096       for(int h=0; h<halfEdges.size(); h++) delete halfEdges[h];
00097       for(int v=0; v<vertices.size(); v++) delete vertices[v];
00098     }
00099 
00100   };
00101 
00102   
00103 }
